extendedInfo.description: Another classic and fun match-3 game with many new exciting features launches on the android market now.If you loved diamend or jewels style games, Jewels Maze is the one that you must have. It is similar to bejeweled but also brings a completely refreshing feeling to the increasingly irksome gameplay, adding a sense of exhilaration and intensity not found before.Highlighted features:- Nice, clean graphics and smooth gameplay.- Support muliti-touch, so you are able to play the game together with your friends.- Well-designed maps, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive.- Match 4 and more to get hidden awards.- More hidden items to make the game more exciting and interesting.Come on! Letâs begin the journey of treasure hunting â Jewels Maze, the latest FREE game from Ezjoy Network, makers of Bubble Pop Plus and Marble Blast.If you like this game, please rate it and recommend to your friends.Thanks for playing!==========================Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games.==========================

reviews.title: It is good to play.
reviews.comment: It is an excellent game I have not stoped playing and would like to have more games like this one. But please take out the adds that y\'all put in your updates . I will stop playing and tell others not to play because of the adds the games are free but buy putting the adds in the updates it also starts the game over. If it keeps on I will delete games that start putting adds on my phone.  I will go on Facebook and let people know that the free games have adds on them and not to download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TAMMBAMMS
reviews.comment: Awesome, I love this game. I play all the time as well as jewles maze 2 and Bubble Kingdom. EZJOY makes the best games going.  <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the Game
reviews.comment: I find this game so relaxing and enjoyable. One of the Best Games Ever!
reviews.author: Robert Ferguson

reviews.title: Music and multi-touch is gone
reviews.comment: This use to be awesome game but the recent updates disabled the music, sound effects, and multi-touch! Boooo
reviews.author: Sherry Lun

reviews.title: Very nice graphics and good level progression
reviews.comment: Very happy with this game. Nice graphics and keeps getting more interesting as you go. Good job.
reviews.author: Smaranda Calin

reviews.title: Loved it!!
reviews.comment: I love this game. It is one of my favorite  games to play. I have found only a few of jewels or match 3 games that have challenged me and kept my attention and jewel maze is one of them.
reviews.author: Sandra Diaz

reviews.title: Funtastic!
reviews.comment: Enjoyable , addicting game, colors are nice and brite which I s good if your sights not so great....speaking of its Grrreat!  Thanks for the good work.  Bobbie from De.
reviews.author: Roberta Phillips

reviews.title: It is fun to play even though it has ads.
reviews.comment: I wish that there were something that I can do about those freaking ads, but nevertheless it\'s a fun game.
reviews.author: Carrie Curtis

reviews.title: Music- AAAARRRGGGGHHHHHH!!!!
reviews.comment: Excellent game.would have given it a four,maybe five stars.but the music loop SUCKS! !!!!! Pleeeeeze change it or at least vary it,surely it cant be that difficult to do??
reviews.author: Hazel Goodrum

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: If only the ads were removed, it would be much better. So far its ei okay. Kip it up.
reviews.author: Nimsaj Canlas

reviews.title: WonderfuL!!
reviews.comment: so nice.. nothing to say.. because aLL i can say is this is interesting and enjoying game..
reviews.author: Gladdies Equial

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: A really fun game! Easy yo learn. Right amount of challenge. Really wish I could save a level in progress instead of having to start over every time :/
reviews.author: Momma IsLearning

reviews.title: Frustrating addiction
reviews.comment: Challenging but certain levels (32) are SO hard it\'s demotivating! Also, too many times getting \"no more moves\" at the very beginning of a game/round should not happen; it wastes time! :-/ Colors can b hard 2 c.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Love it cuz it\'s easy to play. If it can keep me up then I love it n it\'s 5:30AM. So u no what that means. I Love It.
reviews.author: Lisa Holmes

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Its  great game its entertaining I recommend this game to ppl who like to be entertained for a long to,e Great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: I love this game. There\'s just not enough levels. Need to add more levels to this game. I have several games down loaded on my phone. But this is the game I come to most often. So please add more levels to this. I will be most appreciative of u. Thank u.
reviews.author: Verena Aubert

reviews.title: Fun and challenging
reviews.comment: It\'s simple enough to please the brain with a bit of challenge as you progress through each level
reviews.author: Sandy Lum

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I have really enjoyed this game, I had no problems until recent update.  I too used my coins for no ads; I now have more than ever. Please fix this. If I want to find out about another game I\'ll do it when I feel like it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just started playing and so far I really enjoy it.
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to play more.
reviews.author: Joette Truitt

reviews.title: Great time killer
reviews.comment: I love this after a long day. Shut off the brain and play.
reviews.author: Arlene Kadrich
